about_the_game:
About This Content

Bolster your freight formations on UK routes with the HKA Bogie Hopper Wagon in Train Sim World 5. These wagons, formerly used to haul coal but more recently used for aggregates haulage, bring additional freight services to the West Coast Main Line timetable, along with 3 additional Scenarios for that route.

Originally built as JMA wagons in 1995, the classification was changed to HKA in 2009 to mark their change from being coal wagons to aggregate wagons – they were also fitted with track-friendly bogies for easier rolling around corners.

The entire fleet of HKA wagons operates on the aggregate flows of DB Cargo UK, and many of them operate in fittingly red DB colours, as per their introduction to Train Sim World in Great Western Express. However, as many as a third of the wagons still retain the weathered tones of National Power, their initial and long-defunct owner.

These wagons can be used with the DB Cargo Class 66 locomotive from West Coast Main Line, or with any other Class 66 you own, including in Training Center, using Free Roam and Formation Designer.

Please Note: For the full experience, we recommend you own Train Sim World 5: West Coast Main Line: London Euston - Milton Keynes which is available as a separate purchase.

Key Features

  • HKA bogie hopper wagon in weathered, National Power livery

  • True-to-life suspension and handling

  • 3x scenarios and an additional freight timetable layer for WCML: London Euston - Milton Keynes

  • Livery Designer, Formation Designer and Scenario Planner compatible. Share your creations with the Creators Club

  • Powered by Dovetail Games’ proprietary SimuGraph® vehicle dynamics engine and Unreal Engine 4® technology

  • Download size: 34.9mb
